works.title: My work
works.description: Here is a part of my experience as software developer.

work-card-1.title: CSS-Tailwind converter
work-card-1.description: This app allows you to convert your CSS code to Tailwind CSS code. It is very useful for those who are starting to use Tailwind CSS.

work-card-2.title: Personal gallery
work-card-2.description: This application shows some ones of my best photos that I have taken in one of my favorite hobbies.

work-card-3.title: CV analyzer
work-card-3.description: Use this app to analyze your CV and get feedback on how to improve it. It uses the OpenAI API.

work-card-4.title: Chords generator
work-card-4.description: Allow us to generate, save and share functionally harmonic progressions using the OpenAI API.

about-me.title: Who am I
about-me.description: My name is Jeffrey Sneider Rengifo Marin but sometimes I sign as Jeffrey S. Rer√≠n. Actually I am studying software engineering. I build excellent experiences with the best practices. Passionate about solving problems and I have facility for self-taught learning.

skills.title: Skills
skills.description: Here are the technologies that I have worked with. I have experience developing applications with MVC architecture and modular applications. Additionally, building REST APIs and GraphQL APIs.

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: Are you interested in my profile? Let's talk!
